name: (02/12) Silver and Iron
description:
Month 2 of 12

  • Idea
  • Review

"Devils are vulnerable to silver. Demons are vulnerable to iron." Armed with this knowledge and twin pistols, a blue one loaded with silver and red one loaded with iron, enter the dungeons and eliminate the fiendish threats within.

Tactical Shooting

If you aim one gun at a time, the Spirit of the corresponding gun can grant you damage resistance. Focus blue for the Spirit of Silver to grant you minor damage resistance against Red Demons and major damage resistance against Blue Devils. Focus red for the Spirit of Iron to grant you minor damage resistance against Blue Devils and major damage resistance against Red Demons. Switching polarities will push back any fiend that has come too close.

Controls

  • Move - WASD | Left Analog
  • Aim - Mouse | Right Analog
  • Fire Blue - M1 | LT
  • Fire Red - M2 | RT
  • Switch Polarity - Q, E, Mouse Wheel | RB, LB
  • Reload - R | X
